hair_type_collections.title: Type 3 Curls (3A-3C)
hair_type_collections.body_html:

Our sulfate-free cleansers gently remove buildup without stripping the natural oils your curls depend on, while our deep conditioners and leave-ins deliver lasting hydration that keeps frizz at bay and bounce intact.

Type 3 curls thrive with the right balance of moisture and lightweight hold. That is why we have assembled curl creams, defining jellies, and refresher sprays that enhance your pattern without weighing it down or leaving flaky residue. From wash day essentials to second-day revival products, this collection supports every step of your curly hair journey. Each formula draws on nourishing botanicals like flaxseed, marshmallow root, and baobab oil, ingredients rooted in traditions of natural hair care across the African diaspora. Define your curls. Own your crown.

hair_type_collections.title: Type 4 Coils (4A-4C)
hair_type_collections.body_html:
CrownKinetics' Type 4 collection is built for the beautifully dense, richly textured coils and kinks that define 4A, 4B, and 4C hair patterns. Our ancestors carried this crown with pride, and so do you. Every product in this collection addresses the specific needs of tightly coiled hair: deep moisture penetration, gentle detangling, maximum shrinkage management, and long-lasting softness without heavy residue.

Type 4 hair is naturally drier because sebum has a harder time traveling down the coil pattern. That is why our formulas prioritize intense hydration through ingredients like shea butter, mango butter, Jamaican black castor oil, and avocado oil. From creamy co-washes and protein-balancing deep conditioners to thick twist butters and sealing oils, every product works to lock in moisture and reduce breakage. Whether you are rocking a wash-and-go, twist-out, bantu knots, or a sleek puff, this collection has you covered. Nurture your coils with ingredients and intention that understand your texture from root to tip.

hair_type_collections.title: Protective Styles
hair_type_collections.body_html:
Protective styling is more than a look; it is a time-honored strategy for length retention, low-manipulation care, and creative self-expression deeply rooted in Black hair culture. CrownKinetics' Protective Styles collection brings together everything you need to install, maintain, and safely remove braids, twists, cornrows, crochet styles, sew-ins, and wigs. From pre-install scalp prep to take-down day recovery, we have thought of every step.

Healthy protective styling starts with a nourished scalp and well-moisturized natural hair underneath. Our lightweight scalp oils keep your roots hydrated without causing buildup, while our braid sprays refresh and condition your hair between wash days. When it is time to take your style down, our detangling and clarifying products make the process gentle and breakage-free. We also carry edge-friendly adhesives, wig caps, and styling accessories that protect your hairline. Protective styles should protect, and with CrownKinetics, they truly do. Keep your hair thriving while you serve every single look.

hair_type_collections.title: Loc Maintenance
hair_type_collections.body_html:
Locs are a sacred expression of identity, culture, and patience. Whether you are in the starter loc phase, cultivating teenage locs, or rocking fully mature freeform or manicured locs, CrownKinetics has developed a dedicated collection to keep your journey healthy and thriving. Our loc care line addresses the unique challenges at every stage: buildup prevention, moisture balance, retwisting hold, and scalp health beneath the locs.

Traditional loc care often relies on heavy waxes and petroleum-based products that cause residue buildup and suffocate the scalp. CrownKinetics takes a different approach with lightweight, water-soluble formulas that provide hold without the heaviness. Our rosewater-infused loc sprays deliver daily moisture, while our tea tree and peppermint scalp serums soothe itchiness and promote healthy follicle function. For retwist days, our natural-hold gels keep your parts crisp without flaking. We also carry lint-free loc wraps and satin-lined caps for overnight protection. From starter locs to waist-length ropes, honor your loc journey with products that respect the process and nourish every strand.

hair_type_collections.title: Men's Grooming
hair_type_collections.body_html:
CrownKinetics' Men's Grooming collection is built specifically for the textured hair and skin needs of Black men and men of color. From tight fades and tapers to grown-out curls, locs, and waves, our products address the unique challenges that come with coily and curly hair textures: razor bumps, ingrown hairs, dry scalp, beard maintenance, and curl definition without the shine or fragrance overload many men want to avoid.

Our lightweight moisturizers absorb quickly without leaving a greasy feel, while our beard oils and balms soften coarse facial hair and soothe the skin underneath. For men rocking waves, our wave creams and pomades provide hold and moisture without flaking. Our post-shave treatments with willow bark and tea tree extract calm irritation and prevent the pseudofolliculitis barbae (razor bumps) that disproportionately affects men with curly hair follicles. Every formula is designed with clean, effective ingredients and understated scents. Step up your grooming game with products that actually understand your hair and skin. Built for kings, by a brand that knows the crown.

hair_type_collections.title: Scalp Health
hair_type_collections.body_html:
Healthy hair starts at the scalp, and CrownKinetics' Scalp Health collection is dedicated to creating the optimal foundation for growth, retention, and comfort. For those with textured hair, scalp issues like dryness, flaking, product buildup, tension from tight styles, and follicular irritation are common but often overlooked. This collection puts your scalp first with targeted treatments, serums, and cleansers that address these concerns head-on.

Our formulas draw on proven botanicals alongside modern dermatological science. Tea tree oil and peppermint stimulate circulation and provide antimicrobial protection. Salicylic acid gently exfoliates dead skin cells and dissolves buildup from styling products. Rosemary and biotin serums support follicle strength at the root level. For those experiencing thinning edges from tight braids or ponytails, our traction alopecia recovery treatments deliver targeted nourishment to stressed hairlines. Whether you are dealing with dandruff, an itchy scalp under protective styles, or simply want to maintain a clean and balanced scalp environment, CrownKinetics gives your foundation the attention it deserves. A healthy crown starts with a healthy scalp.

CrownKinetics' Shampoos and Conditioners collection is the foundation of every healthy textured hair regimen. We understand that wash day for curly, coily, and kinky hair is a ritual, not a rush. Choose from clarifying shampoos that remove weeks of product buildup without stripping, gentle co-washes for mid-week refreshes, moisturizing shampoos infused with honey and coconut milk, and protein-rich deep conditioners that restore elasticity and strength. Our rinse-out conditioners deliver instant slip for painless detangling, while our deep conditioning masks provide 20-minute transformations with ingredients like hydrolyzed keratin, argan oil, and murumuru butter. Every formula is pH-balanced for textured hair, which tends to be more alkaline and porous. Build your wash day around products that work as hard as you do. Clean hair, deep moisture, zero compromise.

product_type_collections.body_html:
Oils and serums have been central to Black and ethnic hair care traditions for generations, from Jamaican black castor oil passed down through Caribbean families to the shea and baobab oils used across West Africa. CrownKinetics honors this heritage with a collection of premium hair oils and targeted scalp serums that deliver moisture, shine, and scalp nourishment rooted in both tradition and modern formulation science.

Our collection includes lightweight daily oils for sealing in moisture after your leave-in conditioner, hot oil treatment blends for deep weekly restoration, and concentrated scalp serums that target specific concerns like thinning, dryness, and inflammation. Key ingredients include cold-pressed Jamaican black castor oil for thickness and growth support, rosemary oil for follicle stimulation, tea tree for antimicrobial scalp cleansing, and sweet almond oil for gentle everyday moisture. Whether you are sealing a twist-out, treating your scalp between protective styles, or adding shine to your locs, our oils and serums are versatile staples for every textured hair type. Feed your crown from the outside in.

product_type_collections.title: Butters & Moisturizers
product_type_collections.body_html:
For textured hair that craves deep, lasting moisture, CrownKinetics' Butters and Moisturizers collection delivers rich hydration that penetrates the hair shaft and stays put. product_type_collections.title: Edge Control
product_type_collections.body_html:
Laid edges are an art form, and CrownKinetics' Edge Control collection gives you the tools to master it. Our edge control products are formulated specifically for textured hairlines, delivering strong, long-lasting hold that keeps your edges sleek and smooth through humidity, sweat, and everything in between, without causing the dryness, breakage, or traction damage that inferior products leave behind.

We know that edges are delicate. The hairline is one of the most fragile areas, especially for those who frequently wear tight styles. That is why every edge control in our collection is enriched with nourishing ingredients like biotin, castor oil, and vitamin E to strengthen and protect while they hold. CrownKinetics' dedicated Loc Products collection brings together every essential for starting, maintaining, and styling locs at any stage. Wigs are a cornerstone of versatility in the Black hair community, offering the freedom to switch up your look while keeping your natural hair protected underneath. The right tools make all the difference for textured hair. CrownKinetics' Combs and Brushes collection features detangling tools, styling brushes, and specialty combs designed specifically for the unique needs of curly, coily, and kinky hair. Generic brushes and fine-tooth combs can rip through textured hair, causing breakage, split ends, and unnecessary pain. Our tools work with your hair's natural pattern, not against it.

product_type_collections.title: Heat Protection
product_type_collections.body_html:
When you choose to straighten, blow-dry, or use heated tools on your textured hair, CrownKinetics' Heat Protection collection ensures your strands stay shielded from thermal damage. Curly and coily hair is naturally more vulnerable to heat damage because its structure makes it more porous, and heat can permanently alter your curl pattern if applied without proper protection. Our heat protectants form an invisible barrier that significantly reduces moisture loss and cuticle damage during heat styling.

Our lightweight heat protectant sprays and serums provide thermal protection up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit without weighing down your hair or leaving greasy residue. Infused with ingredients like argan oil, silk amino acids, and ceramides, they simultaneously protect and condition, leaving your blowout or press silky, shiny, and bouncy. For those who occasionally straighten their natural hair, our products help ensure that your curls bounce back after washing. We also carry thermal styling tools with adjustable temperature settings, because lower heat with the right product is always better than high heat with none. Protect the curl pattern you love, even when you choose to temporarily change it.

CrownKinetics' Kids Collection is formulated with the gentlest, most effective ingredients for young crowns. Children's textured hair requires special care: their scalps are more sensitive, their hair is finer and more delicate, and wash day should be a positive experience that teaches them to love and care for their natural texture from an early age. Every product in this collection is pediatrician-tested, tear-free, and designed to make hair care fun rather than a struggle.

Our kids' line features gentle cleansing shampoos that remove dirt without irritating sensitive scalps, easy-rinse conditioners with extra slip for painless detangling, and lightweight moisturizers that keep little curls and coils soft and manageable between styles. We also carry soft-hold styling products for two-strand twists, puffs, and braids. Help your little ones build a healthy, joyful relationship with their natural hair from the very beginning.

concern_based_collections.title: Growth & Retention
concern_based_collections.body_html:
Length retention is the holy grail of textured hair care, and CrownKinetics' Growth and Retention collection brings together the most effective products for supporting healthy hair growth and keeping every inch you earn. For curly, coily, and kinky hair, the challenge is often not growing hair but retaining length, since breakage, dryness, and mechanical damage from styling can set back months of progress in a single session.

Our growth-focused products work on two fronts: stimulating the scalp to optimize the growth environment and strengthening the hair shaft to prevent breakage along the length. Our rosemary and peppermint scalp serums increase blood circulation to the follicles, delivering nutrients where growth begins. Biotin-infused leave-ins and strengthening masks fortify hair from the inside out with proteins and amino acids. Our protective sealants and end-repair serums target the oldest, most vulnerable parts of your hair to prevent split ends from traveling up the shaft. Combined with protective styling and gentle handling, this collection gives your hair the best possible chance to reach its full length potential. Grow long, stay strong.

concern_based_collections.title: Damage Repair
concern_based_collections.body_html:
Whether it is from heat damage, chemical processing, color treatments, or years of harsh styling practices, damaged textured hair needs targeted repair to restore its health, elasticity, and natural curl pattern. CrownKinetics' Damage Repair collection features intensive treatments and daily-use products specifically formulated to rebuild, restore, and revive compromised curly, coily, and kinky hair from the inside out.

Our protein-moisture balanced approach addresses both symptoms and root causes of hair damage. Hydrolyzed keratin and silk protein treatments fill in gaps along the hair cuticle, restoring strength and reducing porosity. Bond-building treatments work at the molecular level to repair broken disulfide bonds caused by chemical and thermal stress. Moisture-rich masks with baobab oil, avocado butter, and hyaluronic acid replenish the hydration that damaged hair struggles to retain on its own. For those transitioning from relaxed to natural hair, our big chop and transition products support you through every stage of the journey. Damage does not have to be permanent. With consistent use of the right repair products, your hair can regain its bounce, strength, and vitality. Rebuild your crown strand by strand.

concern_based_collections.title: Anti-Breakage
concern_based_collections.body_html:
Breakage is the number one enemy of length retention for textured hair, and CrownKinetics' Anti-Breakage collection tackles it from every angle. Curly, coily, and kinky hair types are structurally more prone to breakage because the bends and kinks in each strand create natural weak points where the cuticle can crack and the cortex can snap. Add in manipulation from styling, dryness from the environment, and friction from cotton fabrics, and breakage becomes a daily battle.

Our anti-breakage products are formulated to fortify these vulnerable points and reduce the mechanical stress that causes snapping and shedding. Strengthening leave-ins with ceramides and amino acids reinforce the hair shaft along its entire length. Our pre-poo oil treatments coat and protect hair before the cleansing process, when wet hair is at its most fragile. Protein-moisture balanced deep conditioners ensure your hair has the structural integrity and flexibility it needs to withstand manipulation. Detangling products with maximum slip minimize the friction and force required during combing and styling. Combined with satin accessories and gentle handling techniques, this collection creates a comprehensive anti-breakage system. Keep every strand where it belongs: on your head.

concern_based_collections.title: Hydration Therapy
concern_based_collections.body_html:
Moisture is life for textured hair, and CrownKinetics' Hydration Therapy collection is your complete moisture restoration system. Curly, coily, and kinky hair textures are inherently moisture-hungry because the twists and bends in each strand make it difficult for natural sebum to travel from the scalp to the ends. Without proper hydration, textured hair becomes brittle, dull, tangled, and prone to breakage. This collection is your answer to chronic dryness.

Our Hydration Therapy products utilize a multi-layer moisturizing approach based on the LOC and LCO methods that have been foundational in the natural hair community. Water-based leave-ins deliver initial hydration. Creamy moisturizers with humectants like glycerin, honey, and aloe vera attract and bind moisture to the hair shaft. Rich oils and butters seal everything in, creating a protective layer that dramatically slows moisture loss. For emergency moisture rescue, our intensive hydrating masks with hyaluronic acid and marshmallow root extract deliver salon-level deep hydration in just fifteen minutes. Every product is formulated for lasting softness without the heavy, greasy feel. Bring your driest, thirstiest hair to this collection and watch the transformation. From straw-like to soft and supple, Hydration Therapy delivers.

concern_based_collections.title: Protective Style Maintenance
concern_based_collections.body_html:
Installing a protective style is only half the equation. Proper maintenance between install and takedown is what determines whether your natural hair comes out healthier or more damaged than when it went in. CrownKinetics' Protective Style Maintenance collection provides the specialized products you need to keep your scalp healthy, your natural hair moisturized, and your style looking fresh for the full duration of your protective style.

Our lightweight braid and twist sprays deliver moisture directly to your natural hair underneath without causing frizz or unraveling your style. Witch hazel and tea tree scalp cleansing sprays refresh your scalp between wash days, removing sweat and product buildup without requiring you to take your style down. Scalp oil applicator bottles with precision tips let you nourish your scalp along the parts without making a mess. Our style-extending edge refreshers keep your hairline sleek, and our anti-itch scalp serums provide relief from the tightness and itching that can occur, especially in the first week of a new install. We also carry satin-lined caps sized to fit over braids, twists, and locs. Make every protective style truly protective with proper maintenance from install to takedown.
